name: SpaceTheme
0:
”Alexa, start space theme”
”Alexa, launch space theme”
”Alexa, enable space theme”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: space theme
des:
You are Go for Launch. Alexa’s space theme adds space-inspired sounds and extraordinary images to your daily experiences. When you ask for things like the weather, timers, alarms, and even jokes, Alexa adds an interstellar twist to your experience. To get started, just say, “Alexa, launch space theme.” 

So you know, the space theme doesn’t transform every aspect of your Alexa experience. To turn it off, just say, “Alexa, turn off Space theme.” 

THINGS TO TRY:
Alexa, what's the weather?
Alexa, set a 9:00 AM alarm
Alexa, set a 10 minute timer
Alexa, turn on light
Alexa, hello
Alexa, how are you?
Alexa, thank you
Alexa, tell me a space joke


THINGS WE WANT YOU TO KNOW:
The Space theme isn’t available on Kids Edition Echo devices or Echo devices that are set in Kids Mode.
